priority.label: Priority
priority.cellBackground:
{{MyTicketsTable.processedTableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (  
  currentRow["priority"] === "Low"
    ? "#3b75b3"        // sun yellow
    : currentRow["priority"] === "Normal"
    ? "#2ab038"        // orange
    : currentRow["priority"] === "High"
    ? "#ffcc4d"        // orange/red
    : "#DDDDDD"        // fallback color
))}}

children.text: Ticket created {{moment(JSTask.ticket.creationDate).format("on MMMM D, YYYY [at] HH:mm") }} Location: {{JSTask.ticket.location}} Equipement type: {{JSTask.ticket.equipmentType.typeName}} Priority: {{JSTask.ticket.priority}}

priority.label: Priority
priority.cellBackground:
{{MyTicketsTable.processedTableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (

    ? "#3b75b3"        // sun yellow
    : currentRow["priority"] === "Normal"
    ? "#2ab038"        // orange
    : currentRow["priority"] === "High"
    ? "#ffcc4d"        // orange/red
    : "#DDDDDD"        // fallback color
))}}
